DOC.brief_summary: This study test hypothesis GW427353 , beta-3 adrenergic agonist , relieve IBS pain discomfort associate symptom IBS patient .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate GW427353 In Subjects With Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis IBS meet Rome II criterion , screen pain score > 1.5 ( 0= pain , 4 = severe pain ) Subjects meet Rome II criterion diagnosis IBS Subjects stool 7 day screen
